kimononet.geo

Class GeoLocation

  • java.lang.Object
    • kimononet.geo.GeoLocation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Parcelable

    public class GeoLocation
extends java.lang.Object
implements Parcelable
    Object stores location in terms of longitude, latitude, and accuracy as well as keeps track of last update time.
    Since:
    2/9/2012
    Version:
    3/16/2012
    Author:
    Zorayr Khalapyan, Wade Norris

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      Indicates the number of bytes in a location parcel.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GeoLocation

        public GeoLocation(double longitude,
           double latitude,
           float accuracy)
        Creates a new GPS location with the specified longitude, latitude, and accuracy. Timestamp will be set to the current System's timestamp.
        Parameters:
        longitude - Longitude of the current location.
        latitude - Latitude of the current location.
        accuracy - Accuracy (in feet) of the current geo location.

      • GeoLocation

        public GeoLocation(double longitude,
           double latitude,
           float accuracy,
           int timestamp)
        Creates a new GPS location with the specified longitude, latitude, accuracy, and timestamp.
        Parameters:
        longitude - Longitude of the current location.
        latitude - Latitude of the current location.
        accuracy - Accuracy (in feet) of the current geo location.
        timestamp - Timestamp when the location was fetched.

      • GeoLocation

        public GeoLocation(Parcel parcel)
        Creates a new location utilizing a parcel.
        Parameters:
        parcel - Parcel constructed according to protocol specification.

    • Method Detail

      • setLocation

        public void setLocation(double longitude,
               double latitude,
               float accuracy)
        Sets GPS longitude, latitude, and accuracy. Timestamp does not change after setting a location.
        Parameters:
        longitude - Longitude to set.
        latitude - Latitude to set.
        accuracy - Accuracy to set.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a string representation of the current location. The string will contain the longitude, latitude, accuracy, and time stamp separated by tab characters.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        A string representation of the current location.

      • move

        public void move(GeoVelocity velocity,
        int currentTime)
        Given a velocity and a current time, the method updates the current location after moving the current location by v*t. All calculation are done according to the formulas specified at Calculate distance, bearing and more between Latitude/Longitude points
        Parameters:
        velocity - The current velocity at which the location is changing.
        currentTime - The current time. This value will be compared with the timestamp of the current location in order to compute change in time and hence, change in distance.

      • distanceTo

        public double distanceTo(GeoLocation loc2)
        Uses Haversine formula to accurately calculate the distance to another GeoLocation.
        Parameters:
        loc2 - GeoLocation of second location to use in calculating distance.
        Returns:
        Returns double precision float with distance to other GeoLocation

      • bearingTo

        public float bearingTo(GeoLocation loc2)
        Calculates the bearing from one GeoLocation to another.
        Parameters:
        loc2 - GeoLocation of second location to calculate bearing to.
        Returns:
        Returns single precision float with bearing between this location and given other location in radians.

      • generateRandomGeoLocation

        public static GeoLocation generateRandomGeoLocation(GeoLocation upperLeftLocation,
                                    GeoLocation lowerRightLocation)
        Generates a random location bounded by the upper left corner and the bottom right corner. Accuracy will be set to the average accuracy of the specified two corner locations.
        Parameters:
        upperLeftLocation - Location of the upper left location.
        lowerRightLocation - Location of the lower right corner.
        Returns:
        A random location bounded by the upper left corner and the bottom right corner.

      • generateRandomGeoLocation

        public static GeoLocation generateRandomGeoLocation(GeoMap map)
        Returns a random location bounded by the provided map.
        Parameters:
        map - The generated random map will be bounded by this value.
        Returns:
        A randomly generated location within the bounded map.
        See Also:
        generateRandomGeoLocation(GeoLocation, GeoLocation)

      • generateRandomBearing

        public static float generateRandomBearing()
        Returns a random bearing value between 0 and 2PI.
        Returns:
        A random bearing value between 0 and 2PI.
